## Examples

**Basic**

Specify the endpoint and get the data when loaded

```jslive
<Fetch endpoint="https://api.github.com/repositories/">
    {({ response, isFetching }) => (
      <List
        heading="Public Repositories"
        loading={isFetching}
        dataSource={response || []}
        renderItem={item => (
          <List.Item.Meta
              avatar={<Avatar size="large" src={item.owner.avatar_url} />}
              title={<a href={item.url} target="_blank">{item.full_name}</a>}
              description={item.description}
          />
        )}
      />
    )}
</Fetch>
```
